title: Add Anthropic auth settings and upgrade to claude-opus-4-5
description: Add ability to connect/disconnect Anthropic provider via OAuth and upgrade default model to claude-opus-4-5.
acceptance_criteria:
- [x] Settings button (gear icon) in header
- [x] Auth dialog shows Anthropic connection status
- [x] Connect button initiates OAuth flow (opens browser)
- [x] User can paste authorization code to complete auth
- [x] Disconnect button removes provider connection
- [x] Default model updated to claude-opus-4-5
- [x] Auth API functions added (getProviders, startOAuthFlow, completeOAuthFlow, disconnectProvider)

title: OpenCode Session & Chat Integration
description: Integrate OpenCode SDK to create sessions and chat. Tauri manages the server process, sessions stored in ~/.dilag/sessions/. UI includes session sidebar + chat view.

title: Fix OpenCode API message parsing
description: Messages were showing as empty bubbles because the SDK wasn't passing the model parameter correctly. Root cause: OpenCode API requires model as object { providerID, modelID } not a string.
acceptance_criteria:
- [x] Messages from assistant display with actual content
- [x] Model parameter correctly formatted as { providerID: "anthropic", modelID: "..." }
- [x] Switch from SDK to direct fetch calls for proper control
- [x] Session messages load when switching sessions
- [x] Text extracted correctly from message parts with type: "text"
